args: Meene! Zethia! We have a problem!
What's got you in such a tizzy\nfirst thing in the morning?
Which way is it to this ＂capital＂\nwhere the army is stationed?
I've always had Ilia to lead the way\nup to this point.
I do hope she isn't cross with me\nfor leaving so suddenly.
But no, this is for the best. After all,\nshe said the army's plan was to use the\npower of other worlds in weapon form.
If the purpose of my existence is war,\nI must fulfill that role.
Aw, that was great, buddy! Nice job!\nYou've got your intro down pat.
Did I study all those things for war?
It is good to bring war to an end,\nbut to live for that purpose alone...
Unbeckoned life, your mere existence frays\nthe weft of this world's order. Return to the\nworld from whence you came!
It seems I have no choice!
Return, I say! Return and never come back!\nYou ought never have been called here!
(Why did I run? Where am I trying to go?)
(Ah, the army. I must go to them.\nBut... where am I?)
I don't understand anything anymore.\nWhat am I doing? What am I? ...Hrgh!
The dragon's wound cuts deep. I am not\nhuman, but I feel pain as they do.
Ilia crafted this flesh vessel well.
You'll not escape, otherworlder! I will\nnot suffer you to live in this world!
(Perhaps it would be better to die here...)
(If the alternative is a life meant for war...\nThen perhaps this is...)
We swapped places since yesterday, huh?\nWell, glad we got out in one piece!
Now lemme see that wound—\nI'll do what first aid I can here.
...'Kay, that should last until we can have\nZethia patch you up proper.
Is it all right for me to return with you?
Obviously! Why would you even ask that?
Because I was born for war.
I overheard you speaking with Meene.
I know the army wishes to use the power\nof other worlds to wage war, and that\nwas the reason you opened the gate.
So I thought I ought to fulfill that purpose.
No. Not at all. But what should I do?
Yet I am here, alive in this world.
If a life of war is the only path ahead,\nthen I must walk it, else I will have\nno right to exist in this world.
Okay, this is a BIG misunderstanding.
It's true that I opened the otherworld gate\nat the army's request.
But I didn't give you flesh so you could\nbecome their WEAPON!
Then why did you do it?
'Cause I wanted to talk to you.
That's it, bud. I never had any intentions\nfor you past that.
That's why you caught me short when you\nasked what your purpose in life was.
Because it was just a selfish whim.
It wasn't selfish! I've enjoyed every\nmoment I've spent with you.
Then I guess it's a good thing I\nwhipped you up a body!
But we need to be clear on this, Mordecai:\nYou don't have to live your life the way I\ntell you to.
No one can tell another person what the\npurpose of their life is supposed to be.\nYou have to find that for yourself.
Really? But not knowing is so painful.
Is an outsider like me truly allowed to go\non living here without a known purpose?
Meanings and purposes are the sort of\nthings you figure out along the way.
Okay, think of it this way: How many lives\ndo you think exist in this world?
Neither do I, and I'm kind of a genius.\nBut it's gotta be a REALLY big number.
And there are probably just as many things\nyou can learn by coming into contact with\nall those different lives.
Right now, you can be living in this world\nin order to figure out WHY you're living in\nthis world. That works for a purpose, yeah?
Assuming you still want to live, that is.
I do, Ilia. I want to live.
I want to live with YOU!
Then let's get home already.\nThe others are waiting for us!
(If we all must find the meaning\nin our own lives...)
(Then for now, at least, I want to believe I\nam here to be a companion to Ilia.)
(For my world began when I met her...)
